item.title: Staff meeting
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

ok i have this command

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffmeeting") && playerRights >= 4) { // 4 = Owner
 for(Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { 
   if(p != null) {
    if(p.playerRights >= 2) { // 2 = Moderator 1 = new rank called NOOB
       p.teleportToX = absX;
       p.teleportToY = absY;
} 
} 
} 
}

and i would like a box to pop up asking
“Would you like to attend this meeting”
anyone know how to make this happen

Read full topic
